name: eeS uoY naC
description:
In this simplistic survival horror, albeit metaphorically so, You will need to escape from a creature known as the black dot. Your main tool is a lantern, use it wisely to drove the black dot away and navigate through the walls. But have no fear, as death is not the end.

This game is a 2D top down survival horror, in which you can't see (with naked eye) the black dot that follows you around and eventually gets to you. You will need to shine your lantern to the black dot to reveal it.  Whenever the black dot catches you, You get an insight that powers your lantern making in larger in each death, thus making your survival chance higher. But, the black dot also gains their fair share of experience in each cycle of killing you, it gets faster every time you die.  Navigate through the map, collect 3 souls and escape from the black dot!

Asset Credits:

  • Godot engine demo project
  • 1001fonts.com
  • incompetech.com
  • soundbible.com
  • freesoundeffects.com

Controls:

W key                         - Move UP
A key                           - Move LEFT
S key                            - Move DOWN
D key                           - Move RIGHT
Left mouse click   - Toggle Lantern
